name: Rock'n'Rover
description:
Gameplay

You remote control a space rover on Mars and have to get it back to safety.

The connection to the rover is not stable.

Mechanics
  • Attack depends on the connection stability, higher stability = higher chance of attacking
  • Defend increases the stability by 10% and blocks twice the damage
  • Heal heals you by 5HP and destabilizes the connection by 10%
  • Flee depends on the stability, if it fails then you lose 10% of the stability
Credits

PizzArt: programmer/artist/designer

TwoSpacesSG: musician
